description:
The N1 tournament has finally come. It appears that World 3 is joining to get the championship.
The fortune teller and gardener meet with a commander who says they will join up as well as Higure`s Numberman.
It appears Numberman has grown rampant and is attacking number base systems. Higure asks Netto for help. He gets trapped in Yaito`s mansion when the computer starts calculating PI just as the N1 tournament starts. Iceman happens to try to save the day but it takes a mysterious Navi who looks like a skull, named Skullman and later is found to be the property of the fortune teller.
The gang runs to get to the battle in five minutes using Yaito`s plane arriving just in time. Dekao is in the first battle and win in 30 seconds. Only to be overshadowed by Blues, who has been reported to have won in only 3 seconds.
